name: Co-Active Coaching Model
description: The Co-Active Coaching Model, developed by CTI, emphasizes the whole person and balances four key aspects: Fulfillment, Balance, Process, and the coach-client relationship. It is designed to empower clients through partnership.

life_meaning.title: What gives your life meaning?
life_meaning.description: Explore what brings fulfillment and meaning to life

core_values.title: What values are most important to you?
core_values.description: Identify and clarify core personal values

available_choices.title: What choices do you have right now?
available_choices.description: Identify current options and choices available

present_moment.title: What is happening in the moment?
present_moment.description: Focus on present moment awareness and experience

emotional_presence.title: How can you stay present with your emotions?
emotional_presence.description: Develop capacity to stay present with emotions

partnership_approach.title: How can we work together as equal partners?

coaching_needs.title: What do you need from me as your coach?
coaching_needs.description: Define what support is needed from the coaching relationship
